00014 #ifndef HTTPCODES_H
00015 #define HTTPCODES_H
00016 
00017 namespace HttpCode {
00018 
00022 enum Codes {
00023    // Success 2xx
00024    // These codes indicate success.
00025 
00029    OK = 200,
00030 
00031 
00032    // Redirect 3xx
00033    // The codes in this section indicate action to be taken (normally
00034    //  automatically) by the client in order to fulfill the request
00035 
00036 
00040    FOUND = 302,
00041 
00045    SEE_OTHER = 303,
00046 
00052    NOT_MODIFIED = 304,
00053 
00054    // Error 4xx, 5xx
00055    // The 5xx codes are intended for cases in which the client seems to have
00056    // erred, and the 5xx codes for the cases in which the server is aware that
00057    // the server has erred. It is impossible to distinguish these cases in
00058    // general, so the difference is only informational.
00059 
00063    BAD_REQUEST = 400,
00064 
00068    FORBIDDEN = 403,
00069 
00074    NOT_FOUND = 404,
00075 
00080    METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED = 405,
00081 
00086    GONE = 410,
00087 
00091    REQUEST_ENTITY_TOO_LARGE = 413,
00092 
00096    REQUEST_URI_TOO_LONG = 414,
00097 
00102    EXPECTATION_FAILED = 417,
00103 
00107    IM_A_TEAPOT = 418,
00108 
00112    INTERNAL_ERROR = 500,
00113 
00118    NOT_IMPLEMENTED = 501,
00119 
00123    SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE = 503,
00124 
00129    HTTP_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED = 505
00130 };
00131 
00132 } // namespace HttpCode
00133 
00134 #endif // HTTPCODES_H
